name: Cisma
description:
In Cisma you will have to use magic and bullets to purge the overwhelming forces of a mysterious cult called Penumbra.

This is a top down, fast paced shooter in which the player will need to use powers and weapons to defeat multiple enemies. These must be eliminated to progress to the next level, which will have greater challenges and difficulties.

This is the result of an University project, any feedback will be welcome.

Credits: Menu music by TheBoseDeity @ freesound.org Tutorial music by tim.kahn @ freesound.org Church and Bar music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio.
